beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, pine sap, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable. Our precious Pale Ale.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable. Our precious Pale Ale.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, pine sap, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #15. Brewed with rye, oats and wheat. Hopped with Cascade. Fermented in our large French oak foudres. Traditional, complex, and zippy.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #15. Brewed with rye, oats and wheat. Hopped with Cascade. Fermented in our large French oak foudres. Traditional, complex, and zippy.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth

beers.notes: Notes of intense ripe peach, green pepper, fresh grass, apricot, and mango jam.
beers.description: Galaxy IPA. 6.0% Brewed with spelt. Hopped intensely and singularly with Galaxy. =)
beers.summary:
Galaxy IPA. 6.0% Brewed with spelt. Hopped intensely and singularly with Galaxy. =)
Notes of intense ripe peach, green pepper, fresh grass, apricot, and mango jam.

beers.notes: Notes of bakers chocolate, pumpernickel toast, mild peat, and burnt sugar.
beers.description: Nitro Black Beer 4.3% Brewed to be our simple, everyday dark beer. Constructed from a base of British Maris Otter malt, as well as a selection of very dark malts.  Hopped gently with Chinook.  Austere, but inviting.
beers.summary:
Nitro Black Beer 4.3% Brewed to be our simple, everyday dark beer. Constructed from a base of British Maris Otter malt, as well as a selection of very dark malts.  Hopped gently with Chinook.  Austere, but inviting.
Notes of bakers chocolate, pumpernickel toast, mild peat, and burnt sugar.

beers.notes: Notes of white grape, hay, clover honey, white peach, and fresh cut grass.
beers.description: Helles Lager 5.3% Brewed with 100% German Pilsner malt and hopped lightly with Hallertau Blanc.  Fermented with our house lager yeast and cold conditioned for four weeks before its release. Refined and eminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Helles Lager 5.3% Brewed with 100% German Pilsner malt and hopped lightly with Hallertau Blanc.  Fermented with our house lager yeast and cold conditioned for four weeks before its release. Refined and eminently crushable.
Notes of white grape, hay, clover honey, white peach, and fresh cut grass.

beers.notes: Notes of green strawberry, lemon-lime, champagne mango, watermelon rind, and mandarin zest.
beers.description: Crushable IPA 4.5% Brewed with pilsner malt, raw & malted wheat, and malted oats.  Acidified in the kettle with a bit of lemon juice.  Fermented with a new blend of yeasts, including our favorite Kolsch strain.  We dry hopped this batch with a whole lot of Simcoe and Citra.  A hopeful reach for warmer months.
beers.summary:
Crushable IPA 4.5% Brewed with pilsner malt, raw & malted wheat, and malted oats.  Acidified in the kettle with a bit of lemon juice.  Fermented with a new blend of yeasts, including our favorite Kolsch strain.  We dry hopped this batch with a whole lot of Simcoe and Citra.  A hopeful reach for warmer months.
Notes of green strawberry, lemon-lime, champagne mango, watermelon rind, and mandarin zest.

beers.notes: Notes of intense tropical fruit, firm pine, ruby red grapefruit, and honeysuckle.
beers.description: Oat IPA. 6.0%  Brewed with oats and PA wildflower honey. Transcendentally hopped with Mosaic, Amarillo, and a bit of Simcoe for good measure.  A perennial favorite that helps pry open that third eye.
beers.summary:
Oat IPA. 6.0%  Brewed with oats and PA wildflower honey. Transcendentally hopped with Mosaic, Amarillo, and a bit of Simcoe for good measure.  A perennial favorite that helps pry open that third eye.
Notes of intense tropical fruit, firm pine, ruby red grapefruit, and honeysuckle.

beers.notes: Notes of lychee, papaya, pink grapefruit, champagne mango, and coconut.
beers.description: Oat IPA 7.0% Brewed with oats. Hopped with a blend of our most favorite citrusy/drippy/pungent American hop varietals. Our most otherworldly IPA... Bow down before the ALien Church!
beers.summary:
Oat IPA 7.0% Brewed with oats. Hopped with a blend of our most favorite citrusy/drippy/pungent American hop varietals. Our most otherworldly IPA... Bow down before the ALien Church!
Notes of lychee, papaya, pink grapefruit, champagne mango, and coconut.

beers.notes: Notes of musky passionfruit, mango nectar, canned pineapple, honeydew, and mandarin orange.
beers.description: Mosaic Double IPA 8.6% Brewed with a bit of malted wheat and hopped exclusively with 2017 Mosaic that we selected in Yakima, Wash. this past harvest.  Extra EXTRA good.
beers.summary:
Mosaic Double IPA 8.6% Brewed with a bit of malted wheat and hopped exclusively with 2017 Mosaic that we selected in Yakima, Wash. this past harvest.  Extra EXTRA good.
Notes of musky passionfruit, mango nectar, canned pineapple, honeydew, and mandarin orange.

beers.notes: Notes of meyer lemon, fragrant hard spice, puckering tamarind, and creamy meringue.
beers.description: Strange Spiced Double Dry Hopped Extra Blonde Ale 7.2% Brewed with a touch of Vienna malt and hopped in the kettle with Motueka and Centennial.  Spiced with tamarind powder and a dash of turmeric to the kettle.  Conditioned on heaps of lemon & tamarind puree, and Tahitian vanilla, and dry hopped with Simcoe, Citra, Crystal, & Cascade.
beers.summary:
Strange Spiced Double Dry Hopped Extra Blonde Ale 7.2% Brewed with a touch of Vienna malt and hopped in the kettle with Motueka and Centennial.  Spiced with tamarind powder and a dash of turmeric to the kettle.  Conditioned on heaps of lemon & tamarind puree, and Tahitian vanilla, and dry hopped with Simcoe, Citra, Crystal, & Cascade.
Notes of meyer lemon, fragrant hard spice, puckering tamarind, and creamy meringue.

beers.notes: Notes of black tea, toast, cinnamon raisin, light coffee, and fertile earth.
beers.description: Black Lagerbier 5.5% Brewed with Pilsner malt, as well as a tasteful flurry of German specialty malts.  Hopped with German grown Saaz and fermented with our house lager yeast.  Extremely stark, restrained, and elegant.
beers.summary:
Black Lagerbier 5.5% Brewed with Pilsner malt, as well as a tasteful flurry of German specialty malts.  Hopped with German grown Saaz and fermented with our house lager yeast.  Extremely stark, restrained, and elegant.
Notes of black tea, toast, cinnamon raisin, light coffee, and fertile earth.

beers.notes: Notes of bakers chocolate, pumpernickel toast, mild peat, and burnt sugar.
beers.description: Black Beer 4.3% Brewed to be our simple, everyday dark beer. Constructed from a base of British Maris Otter malt, as well as a selection of very dark malts. Hopped gently with Chinook. Austere, but inviting.
beers.summary:
Black Beer 4.3% Brewed to be our simple, everyday dark beer. Constructed from a base of British Maris Otter malt, as well as a selection of very dark malts. Hopped gently with Chinook. Austere, but inviting.
Notes of bakers chocolate, pumpernickel toast, mild peat, and burnt sugar.

beers.notes: Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth.
beers.description: Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #18. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
beers.summary:
Our Four-Grain Saison. 4.8% Batch #18. Brewed with rye, oats, wheat and Cascade hops. This is our most accurate interpretation of traditional Saison.
Notes of lemon zest, pear, barnyard, hay, guava, juicy fruit, and earth.

beers.notes: Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.
beers.description: Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
beers.summary:
Our American Pale Ale. 5.5% Brewed with oats. Hopped intensely with Simcoe, Centennial, and Amarillo. Hazy, juicy, and imminently crushable.
Notes of tangelo, kiwi, dank, nectarine, honeysuckle, and grapefruit.

beers.notes: Notes of grapefruit zest, orange oil, pine tar, and a snappy earthiness.
beers.description: Rye Double IPA 8.8% Brewed with heaps of flaked rye. Hopped in the kettle with the almighty Simcoe. Then aggressively dry hopped with Equinox and Citra. Pungent and nostalgic.
beers.summary:
Rye Double IPA 8.8% Brewed with heaps of flaked rye. Hopped in the kettle with the almighty Simcoe. Then aggressively dry hopped with Equinox and Citra. Pungent and nostalgic.
Notes of grapefruit zest, orange oil, pine tar, and a snappy earthiness.

beers.notes: Notes of meyer lemon zest, pizza crust, delicate perfume, and orange blossom.
beers.description: Super Kvass. 4.7% Brewed with 60 pounds of house made rye caraway bread, Pilsner malt and 6 row barley. Gently hopped with Saaz and Lemondrop. Fermented with a sourdough culture that our Baker, Jean-Luc, wrangled and our Magickal saison yeast.
beers.summary:
Super Kvass. 4.7% Brewed with 60 pounds of house made rye caraway bread, Pilsner malt and 6 row barley. Gently hopped with Saaz and Lemondrop. Fermented with a sourdough culture that our Baker, Jean-Luc, wrangled and our Magickal saison yeast.
Notes of meyer lemon zest, pizza crust, delicate perfume, and orange blossom.

beers.notes: Notes of ripe passion fruit, tropical parfait, wet ferns, and guava hard candies.
beers.description: Jasmine Rice IPA. 5.0% Brewed with jasmine rice and fluffy oats. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Mosaic and Simcoe, then thoughtfully dry hoppped with Wakatu, Moasic and Simcoe.
beers.summary:
Jasmine Rice IPA. 5.0% Brewed with jasmine rice and fluffy oats. Assertively hopped in the kettle with Mosaic and Simcoe, then thoughtfully dry hoppped with Wakatu, Moasic and Simcoe.
Notes of ripe passion fruit, tropical parfait, wet ferns, and guava hard candies.

beers.notes: Notes of keffir lime leaves, lemongrass, plump cacti, and underripe mango.
beers.description: French IPA. 6.5%  Brewed with French Pilsner malt and fluffy oats. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Cascade, then dry hopped aggressively with French Aramis and a touch of Amarillo. Biere de soif!
beers.summary:
French IPA. 6.5%  Brewed with French Pilsner malt and fluffy oats. Thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Cascade, then dry hopped aggressively with French Aramis and a touch of Amarillo. Biere de soif!
Notes of keffir lime leaves, lemongrass, plump cacti, and underripe mango.

beers.notes: Notes of grapefruit pith,honeydew melon, moist garden soil, and dandelion greens.
beers.description: Farmhouse IPA. 6.0% Brewed with our dear friend Ilya. It was brewed entirely with French pilsner malt. Solely and thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Brewers Gold. Fermented with a new magikal mixed culture in stainless. Then gently dry hopped with Brewers Gold, Lemondrop and French Strisselspalt.
beers.summary:
Farmhouse IPA. 6.0% Brewed with our dear friend Ilya. It was brewed entirely with French pilsner malt. Solely and thoughtfully hopped in the kettle with Brewers Gold. Fermented with a new magikal mixed culture in stainless. Then gently dry hopped with Brewers Gold, Lemondrop and French Strisselspalt.
Notes of grapefruit pith,honeydew melon, moist garden soil, and dandelion greens.

beers.notes: Notes of black tea, lemon zest, tobacco leaf, and savory biscuits.
beers.description: Biere de Mars. 5.2% Brewed with Chateau Monastique and Pilsner malt. Hopped aggressively with French Strisselspalt. Fermented with our favorite lager yeast and our magickal saison yeast, then conditioned on smoked paprika.
beers.summary:
Biere de Mars. 5.2% Brewed with Chateau Monastique and Pilsner malt. Hopped aggressively with French Strisselspalt. Fermented with our favorite lager yeast and our magickal saison yeast, then conditioned on smoked paprika.
Notes of black tea, lemon zest, tobacco leaf, and savory biscuits.
